resources.string: \ Sudoku is a logic-based number placement puzzle. You start with a partially compeleted 9x9 grid, then the objective is to fill the grid so that each row, each colum, and each of the 3x3 boxes (also called blocks) contains the digits 1 to 9 exactly one. \n\n Sahar is a devilishly handsome 21-year old graduate student in the Computer Science department.
